item.title: Nika add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I find out a lot about myself by sleeping. Dreams, they are who I am when I’m too tired to be me." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Nika add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Here's all you have to know about men and women: women are crazy, men are stupid. And the main reason women are crazy is that men are stupid." -- George Carlin

item.title: Nika add a quote by C. JoyBell C.
item.description: "She didn't belong anywhere and she never really belonged to anyone. And everyone else belonged somewhere and to someone. People thought she was too wonderful. But she only wanted to belong to someone. People always thought she was too wonderful to belong to them or that something too wonderful would hurt too much to lose. And that's why she liked him-- because he just thought she was crazy." -- C. JoyBell C.

item.title: Nika add a quote by Mitch Hedberg
item.description: "I would imagine that if you could understand Morse code, a tap dancer would drive you crazy." -- Mitch Hedberg

item.title: Nika add a quote by Emme Rollins
item.description: "Sometimes there’s no cure for the crazy.” Dale sighed, stroking my hair. “I think we all just have to keep loving through it. Maybe that’s the cure." -- Emme Rollins
